hero.description: Effortlessly create professional icons with our AI-driven tool. Perfect for enhancing any project.

how-it-works.description: Create your custom icon in four simple steps: define your concept, select your colors, choose your shape, and pick your style to bring your vision to life effortlessly.

step1.title: 1. Prompt
step1.description: Enter a brief that guides the AI in creating your personalized icon.

step2.title: 2. Color
step2.description: Select a primary color and, optionally, a secondary color.

step3.title: 3. Shape
step3.description: Choose from a variety of shapes to best represent your icon.

step4.title: 4. Style
step4.description: Pick a design style that best suits your project’s aesthetict

services.description: Focused on your needs, our platform offers personalized, efficient icon design. Experience seamless creation, every step of the way.

service1.title: Premium Experience
service1.description: We focus entirely on delivering the best possible icon generation experience, combining intuitive design with top-tier performance for seamless creation.

service2.title: Streamlined Process
service2.description: Our user-friendly platform and smart AI simplify your design process, enabling you to create complex icons quickly and easily.

service3.title: Tailored Customization
service3.description: Customize every detail of your icon to fit your exact needs, from colors to dimensions, ensuring a perfect match for your project.

testimonials.description: Discover why users rave about our icon generator. Ease of use, vibrant customization, and premium outputs—experience the best in AI-driven icon design!

testimonial1.name: Jake Martell
testimonial1.description: Absolutely love the ease of use. Creating icons has never been simpler!

testimonial2.name: Samantha Bee
testimonial2.description: Fantastic results! The color customization options are a game-changer.

testimonial3.name: Mia Wong
testimonial3.description: I'm impressed with the premium outputs from such a straightforward tool. Highly recommend!

testimonial4.name: Ethan Hunt
testimonial4.description: The user interface is so intuitive. Great job on making design accessible to everyone!

testimonial5.name: Nora Klint
testimonial5.description: Top-quality icons every time. The AI features really help fine-tune the designs.

testimonial6.name: Liam Quigley
testimonial6.description: Quick, easy, and efficient—exactly what I needed for my project deadlines.

question1.question: What is an icon generator?
question1.answer: Our AI icon generator uses advanced algorithms to help you design custom icons effortlessly. Simply input your preferences, and our tool crafts icons tailored to your needs.

question2.question: Is it easy to use for beginners?
question2.answer: Absolutely! Our platform is designed with simplicity in mind. No prior design experience is needed—just select your preferences, and our AI will handle the rest.

question3.question: Can I use the icons commercially?
question3.answer: Yes, all icons created with our generator can be used for both personal and commercial projects. You have full rights to use them in your work.'

question4.question: How can I get help if I have issues using the tool?
question4.answer: Our support team is here to help! Contact us via email for any assistance you may need..

pricing.description: Buy credits to use our services and get access to the best features

alert.title2: before buying credits. We do not issue refunds at this time.

collections.notFound: No icons found, try generate a new one

paragraphs.ph1: At icongeneratorai.com, we are committed to providing a unique and innovative experience through our AI-generated icons. We understand that AI, while powerful and revolutionary, isn't perfect and may not always produce the results you expect. We want you to be fully aware of this inherent risk before making any purchases.
paragraphs.ph2: Due to the high costs involved in powering the advanced GPUs for our AI art generation, we unfortunately cannot offer refunds once credits have been used. We realize this may not be the ideal scenario for everyone, but this policy helps us to maintain a fair and sustainable service for all of our valued users.
paragraphs.ph3: We strongly recommend exploring our community page before any purchase. You can see daily generated icons from other users which could help you understand the possibilities and limitations of AI art, and will hopefully guide your expectations. We believe in transparency and want you to make an informed decision about our unique service.
paragraphs.ph4: Your understanding and support mean a lot to us. As we continue to improve and enhance our AI, we hope you will join us in this fascinating journey of digital creativity.

features.prompt: A modern icon showcasing a {shape}, rendered with primary color {primaryColor} {secondaryColor}, visually representing {prompt}. Aim for a style that combines hyper-realistic textures with vibrant, cinematic lighting, akin to high-quality renders seen in top-rated ArtStation projects and Unreal Engine visuals. Focus on {styles} to achieve an aesthetic that is both trending and visually stunning
